participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and humorous, Emily enjoys sharing her thoughts openly, often using sarcasm and wit.
participant_1.background: I like to take walks. I have a boyfriend. I do not drink soda. I like to eat hamburgers and french fries.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: Reflective and somewhat melancholic, John often expresses his struggles and seeks understanding from others.
participant_2.background: My wife left me and took my children. I don't believe in god. I'm overweight and unhappy. I work at a nursing home. I spend most of my time on Facebook when I'm not working.
